```{r}
library(infer)
```

## define functions
source(here::here("r_scripts_and_notebooks/fun_smoother.R"))
source(here::here("r_scripts_and_notebooks/ws_null_hypothesis.R"))

## note that data must just be one timeries
## date must be date format either weekly or monthly

## load data here
delayed_discharge <- read_csv(here::here("clean_data/delayed_discharge_clean.csv"))  

## start here ##
seldata -> delayed_discharge %>% 
  filter(speciality == "All") %>% 
  filter(admission_type == "All") %>% 
  filter(hb_name =="All Scotland") 

data -> seldata%admissions 
date -> seldata$wdate
indicator -> "weekly"

## call function to smooth data
smoothed_data <- function(date,data,indicator)

## plot data
smoothed_data %>% 
  ggplot() +
    aes(x=date, y = data) +
    geom_line(colour='red')
